abstract.t: WebTransport [OVERVIEW], a protocol framework within the Web security model, empowers Web clients to initiate secure multiplexed transport for low-level client-server interactions with remote servers. This document outlines a protocol, based on WebSocket [WEBSOCKET], offering WebTransport capabilities similar to the HTTP/2 variant [WEBTRANSPORT-H2]. It serves as an alternative when UDP-based protocols are inaccessible, and the client environment exclusively supports WebSocket [WEBSOCKET].
